content: How may I assist you today?
Tell me how is the weather in Bucharest right now ?

Bucharest, Romania is currently experiencing a mild climate with temperatures ranging from 15 to 25 degrees Celsius (59 to 77 degrees Fahrenheit). There is also some sunshine throughout the day, making it a pleasant time to visit. Would you like to know more about the weather in Bucharest or is there anything else I can help you with?
